knxUltimateHueLight.title: HUE node
knxUltimateHueLight.no_devices: No Hue devices found. Click refresh after pairing a new light.
knxUltimateHueLight.override_set_day_fast_this: Switch to DAY mode by rapid switching the light off then on (this light only)
knxUltimateHueLight.override_set_day_fast_all: Switch to DAY mode by rapid switching the light off then on (apply to ALL light nodes)
knxUltimateHueLight.knx_brightness_onhueoff: When HUE light is Off send 0%. When HUE On, restore previous value (Default KNX behaviour)
knxUltimateHueLight.use_min_brightness: Use minimum brightness specified in the HUE light
knxUltimateHueLight.temp_desc_2200: (start of Philips White Ambiance lights range)
knxUltimateHueLight.temp_desc_2700: (warm white, intimate, cozy, personal, for living rooms)
knxUltimateHueLight.temp_desc_3000: (soft white, warm, calming, for bathrooms and kitchens)
knxUltimateHueLight.temp_desc_3500_day: (neutral white, balanced, friendly, inviting, for office spaces and retail)
knxUltimateHueLight.temp_desc_3500_night: (not recommended for night time - neutral white, for office spaces and retail)
knxUltimateHueLight.temp_desc_4100_day: (cool white, precise, clean, focused, for garages and grocery stores)
knxUltimateHueLight.temp_desc_4100_night: (not recommended for night time - cool white, precise, clean, focused, for garages and grocery stores)
knxUltimateHueLight.temp_desc_5000_day: (bright white, vibrant, crisp, for warehouses, sports stadiums and healthcare)
knxUltimateHueLight.temp_desc_5000_night: (not recommended for night time - bright white, vibrant, crisp, for warehouses, sports stadiums and healthcare)
knxUltimateHueLight.temp_desc_6500_night: (not recommended for night time - daylight, alert, energetic, for indoor agriculture)
knxUltimateHueLight.effect_tip: Provide KNX value / Hue effect pairs. When the incoming KNX payload matches the value, the selected effect is applied to the light.
knxUltimateHueLight.effect_tip_status: If a status group address is configured, the current Hue effect is emitted using the mapped KNX value or the effect name.
knxUltimateHueLight.effect_not_supported: This light does not expose Hue effects.
